name: Euro Fishing: Foundry Dock + Season Pass
name_original: Euro Fishing: Foundry Dock + Season Pass
description:
The Euro Fishing Foundry Dock and Season Pass bundle gives you all of the add-ons available for Euro Fishing for one great price. Not only will you receive our stunning Urban Venue, Foundry Dock but also the next 4 lake add-ons upon their release starting with the licensed Manor Farm Lake on the famous Linear Fisheries complex that is out now.

By purchasing this bundle, as well as saving money, you will get:

•	2 stunning lake add-ons immediately – Foundry Dock and Manor Farm Lake
•	3 future venues – one in winter 2017 and two in early 2018
•	40+ boss fish to target
•	20+ achievements to unlock
•	Single player or hosted multiplayer tournaments, tracking and comparing catches in real time against friends and opponents

Whether you’re a fishing beginner or angling pro, the Euro Fishing Foundry Dock and Season Pass accurately and authentically replicates the feeling of actual fishing, using our unique physics-based casting and reeling system. 

Get out and fish! Requires Euro Fishing core game, sold separately.
